title: Wrapping Up Our 'Industry' Talk With Myha'la Herrold
description:
Chris and Andy give some final thoughts on 'The Mandalorian' and the forthcoming Beatles documentary 'Get Back' (1:00). Then, they talk with 'Industry' star Myha'la Herrold about how she came to play Harper on the show (12:43) and what it was like to work with veteran actors like Ken Leung (29:41).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Myha'la Herrold
